text: Clint Ramos is a Filipino-American costume and set designer, best known for his work on the 2016 Broadway production of Eclipsed, for which he won the Tony Award for Best Costume Design in a Play. He has received two additional Tony Award nominations for his work on the 2018 Broadway revival of Once on This Island, and the 2019 Broadway revival of Torch Song.
